mapper.select: select * from movie where boxoffice > 0 order by boxoffice asc;
select * from movie order by moviestar desc, movierelease desc limit 0,10;
select * from movie order by movielike desc, movierelease desc limit 0,20
select * from movie where moviegenre like concat("%",#{genre},"%") order by movierelease desc
select * from movie where movienation like "%한국%" order by movierelease desc
select * from movie where movienation not like "%한국%" order by movierelease desc
select * from movie where moviegenre like concat(#{genre},"%") and moviecode not in(#{moviecode}) order by movierelease desc
select movietitle from movie where movietitle like concat("%", #{searchValue},"%")

select * from movie where movietitle like concat("%", #{keyword},"%") union select m.* from movie m, actor a where m.moviecode = a.moviecode and a.actorname like concat("%", #{keyword},"%") order by movierelease desc
mapper.update: update movie set movielike = movielike + 1 where moviecode=#{moviecode}
update movie set movielike = movielike - 1 where moviecode=#{moviecode}
update movie set moviestar = #{avg} where moviecode=#{moviecode}
